block_comment: This block of code is primarily responsible for setting different modes of operation mapped to different control bits. It uses a case construct to differentiate how the "td_mode" wire behaves according to the different 3-bit binary patterns from the "ctrl_bits_for_mux" input. Depending on the input value, "td_mode" is assigned a predetermined 4-bit binary value, effectively implementing a binary to binary mapping to control downstream operations in the hardware design.
